alert.note: Alert for Cass; Douglas; Sarpy; Saunders (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SARPY...SOUTH CENTRAL DOUGLAS... SOUTHEASTERN SAUNDERS AND NORTH CENTRAL CASS COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM CDT... At 445 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 6 miles south of Yutan, or 7 miles west of Gretna, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Omaha, Papillion, Ralston, Gretna, La Vista, Ashland, Springfield, Louisville, Cedar Creek, Chalco, Prairie Queen Recreation Area, Walnut Creek Recreation Area, Wehrspann Lake, Memphis, South Bend, Louisville State Recreation Area, Two Rivers State Recreation Area, Schramm Park State Recreation Area, Platte River State Park, and Memphis State Recreation Area. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 428 and 444. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
